name: Stygius
description:
Project your head to find new perspectives and to explore a weird  world...

The game has the SatteliteGaze System, in which you can project your head to nearby walls to have a perspective shift, you stay linked to the head the whole time.

Game artist: Francisco Lucas @ciscookiess Francisco_ Unreal Engine Programmer:  Nathan Gabriel NeitherNathan @NeitherNathan


*The game is incomplete, there's a bug that doesn't let the player go to next levels, there is a full version itch page but it can't be linked here*
